content.text: Hey there, what do you like to do for fun?
Well, I love to run and I recently ran my first 5k race with my spouse and child cheering me on.
That's awesome! I used to run but I got hurt and haven't been able to do it anymore.
Oh no, that's too bad. I'm sorry to hear that.
Thank you. I'm still trying to figure out what I want to do to get in shape again.
Well, I'm sure you'll figure it out. You seem like a very active person.
Thank you! I like to think so. I enjoy riding horses as well.
Oh, that sounds like fun! I've never been horseback riding before.
It's really great. You should try it sometime!
Awesome! I'm sure you'd love it.
Thanks, I'm looking forward to trying it.
If you do, let me know how it goes!
I will! Thanks for the conversation.
No problem, it was nice talking to you!
